attributes.action: Allow the uk public to force a general election
attributes.additional_details:
Because the levels of lies and corruption are becoming so apparent and things need to change.
You work for us, its time you were reminded of that
attributes.background: Allow the uk public to have the right to hold our governmental employees to account and be able to force a general election when WE feel that the current government are acting dishonestly or flouting rules

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/603106
